description: This is the main activity class for an Android note-taking application, responsible for displaying, searching, and deleting notes, as well as navigation to note detail/edit screens.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main screen of the note app, handling UI interactions, displaying notes, and navigation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up RecyclerView, FAB button, and search listener.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Refreshes note list when activity resumes.

methods.name: performSearch
methods.description: Filters notes based on search query.

methods.name: onItemClick
methods.description: Handles click events on individual notes, opening the detail/edit screen.

methods.name: onItemLongClick
methods.description: Handles long-press to delete a note with confirmation dialog.
